data.text:
A few days later, we were looking over documents 
in the library…… I brought up what the instructor 
told me about Zenno Rob Roy the other day.

choices.text: You were going to enter the Sports Festival, right?
choices.processed: <size=32>You were going to enter the Sports Festival, right?</size>

choices.text: You were going to enter the Sports Festival, right?
choices.processed: <size=32>You were going to enter the Sports Festival, right?</size>

data.processed:
󠁿A few days later, we were looking over documents 
󠁿in the library…… I brought up what the instructor 
󠁿told me about Zenno Rob Roy the other day.

data.text:
Eh, ah, yeah……! 
So you knew already……!
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
󠁿Eh, ah, yeah……! 
󠁿So you knew already……!

data.text:
Zenno Rob Roy seemed bewildered at first, but she seemed to 
understand when I mentioned her instructor told me.
data.processed:
󠁿Zenno Rob Roy seemed bewildered at first, but she seemed to 
󠁿understand when I mentioned her instructor told me.

data.text:
The Sports Festival is an event held at Tracen 
Academy. There were some students focused on 
conditioning their bodies for these races.

choices.text: Do your best! I'll be cheering for you!

data.processed:
󠁿The Sports Festival is an event held at Tracen 
󠁿Academy. There were some students focused on 
󠁿conditioning their bodies for these races.

data.text: Yeah…… thank you…… very much……
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: 󠁿Yeah…… thank you…… very much……

data.text:
……Ah, no, it's not that I'm not thankful for that! 
I'm sorry, it's just…… I'm not the type that stands out.
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
󠁿……Ah, no, it's not that I'm not thankful for that! 
󠁿I'm sorry, it's just…… I'm not the type that stands out.

data.text:
That's why…… I think even if you took the time 
to come and watch, I don't think there's much 
you'd notice about me…… is what I think.
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
󠁿That's why…… I think even if you took the time 
󠁿to come and watch, I don't think there's much 
󠁿you'd notice about me…… is what I think.

data.text:
……if you've already spoken with the instructor, 
then Trainer-san…… I'm sure you already know, 
right? How poorly I've been doing lately.
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy

choices.text: Sorry, for prying……

data.processed:
󠁿……if you've already spoken with the instructor, 
󠁿then Trainer-san…… I'm sure you already know, 
󠁿right? How poorly I've been doing lately.

data.text:
No! Thank you very much for being concerned about me. 
It's true that lately, I've been at a loss…… ehehe.
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
󠁿No! Thank you very much for being concerned about me. 
󠁿It's true that lately, I've been at a loss…… ehehe.

data.text:
Ever since I was young, I've never really had any 
specialties. My favorite thing has always been only 
books pretty much…… it's extremely plain.
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
󠁿Ever since I was young, I've never really had any 
󠁿specialties. My favorite thing has always been only 
󠁿books pretty much…… it's extremely plain.

data.text:
And me too, I'm used to being unremarkable. Even if someone 
comes to see me, it's…… still embarrassing……
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
󠁿And me too, I'm used to being unremarkable. Even if someone 
󠁿comes to see me, it's…… still embarrassing……

data.text:
At the very least, I wanted to get good enough that I wouldn't be 
embarrassed, but I was anxious, too anxious…… and ended up 
hurting myself again.
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
󠁿At the very least, I wanted to get good enough that I wouldn't be 
󠁿embarrassed, but I was anxious, too anxious…… and ended up 
󠁿hurting myself again.

data.text:
Just being there, in a place where people's gazes 
naturally gather, like the hero of a story…… it's 
almost funny how far away that feels.
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
󠁿Just being there, in a place where people's gazes 
󠁿naturally gather, like the hero of a story…… it's 
󠁿almost funny how far away that feels.

data.text: It's pathetic…… like this, I can't even live up to my name.
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy

choices.text: Live up to your name?

data.processed: 󠁿It's pathetic…… like this, I can't even live up to my name.

data.text: Yeah…… Ah, well, you see……
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: 󠁿Yeah…… Ah, well, you see……

data.text:
Saying that, Zenno Rob Roy, grabbed 
a book from the shelf without even pausing.
data.processed:
󠁿Saying that, Zenno Rob Roy, grabbed 
󠁿a book from the shelf without even pausing.

data.text:
『Rob Roy』 ……my name is the same as the 
hero written about in this story.
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
󠁿『Rob Roy』 ……my name is the same as the 
󠁿hero written about in this story.

data.text:
Defeating the strong, protecting the weak. Continuing 
to fight on to restore his family's honor, the people's 
hero…… completely different from me.
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy

choices.text: Rob Roy……

data.processed:
󠁿Defeating the strong, protecting the weak. Continuing 
󠁿to fight on to restore his family's honor, the people's 
󠁿hero…… completely different from me.

data.text:
Ahaha, ha………… 
I'm sorry, I'm heading back for the day……!
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
󠁿Ahaha, ha………… 
󠁿I'm sorry, I'm heading back for the day……!

data.text:
I tried to chase after her but, there was no way I could keep up 
with an Uma Musume's legs. Before I knew it, I lost sight of her……

choices.text: (A place that Rob Roy might go……)

data.processed:
󠁿I tried to chase after her but, there was no way I could keep up 
󠁿with an Uma Musume's legs. Before I knew it, I lost sight of her……

data.text:
After thinking for a moment, I took off. 
For some reason, I felt like I had a clue.
data.processed:
󠁿After thinking for a moment, I took off. 
󠁿For some reason, I felt like I had a clue.

data.text:
The training course―― As I thought, Zenno Rob 
Roy was there. Standing by herself, she was looking 
out over the training course from afar.

choices.text: Rob Roy!

data.processed:
󠁿The training course―― As I thought, Zenno Rob 
󠁿Roy was there. Standing by herself, she was looking 
󠁿out over the training course from afar.

data.text:
Eh…… huh? Trainer-san!? 
Why are you here……!?
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy

choices.text: I didn't think you'd just head home

data.processed:
󠁿Eh…… huh? Trainer-san!? 
󠁿Why are you here……!?

data.text:
I-I'm pretty sure that the situation would make it 
seem like I was heading home though……!
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy

choices.text: But you have a hard time giving up
But you have a hard time giving up

data.processed:
󠁿I-I'm pretty sure that the situation would make it 
󠁿seem like I was heading home though……!

data.text:
I pulled out the notebook I picked up yesterday. Contained within 
was her struggles through trial and error, it was proof of Zenno 
Rob Roy's refusal to give up.
data.processed:
󠁿I pulled out the notebook I picked up yesterday. Contained within 
󠁿was her struggles through trial and error, it was proof of Zenno 
󠁿Rob Roy's refusal to give up.

data.text: Ah, that's……! D-did you by chance, look inside……!?
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy

choices.text: Sorry, I wanted to confirm the owner……
choices.processed: <size=41>Sorry, I wanted to confirm the owner……</size>

data.processed: 󠁿Ah, that's……! D-did you by chance, look inside……!?

data.text:
Ah, Ahaha…… it's really silly isn't it? Acting like 
I've given up, but then writing like that in my notebook.
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
󠁿Ah, Ahaha…… it's really silly isn't it? Acting like 
󠁿I've given up, but then writing like that in my notebook.

data.text:
Even if it's not possible…… Sorry for letting you 
see something so weird. It's fine if you throw that away.
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy

choices.text: I won't thow it away

data.processed:
󠁿Even if it's not possible…… Sorry for letting you 
󠁿see something so weird. It's fine if you throw that away.

data.text:
Ah…… Y-you're right, sorry about that. 
I should properly throw it away myself―
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy

choices.text: I just wanted to confirm

data.processed:
󠁿Ah…… Y-you're right, sorry about that. 
󠁿I should properly throw it away myself―

data.text: Confirm……?
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy

choices.text: Rob Roy. What is your dream?
Rob Roy. What is your dream?

data.processed: 󠁿Confirm……?

data.text:
Ah……!…… ………… 
……I …………y-you won't laugh?
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy

choices.text: I won't laugh. Promise

data.processed:
󠁿Ah……!…… ………… 
󠁿……I …………y-you won't laugh?

data.text: The truth is, I…… I saw a dream where I became a hero.
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: 󠁿The truth is, I…… I saw a dream where I became a hero.

data.text:
She spoke softly if she was telling some huge secret, 
but also as if it was a very precious treasure.
data.processed:
󠁿She spoke softly if she was telling some huge secret, 
󠁿but also as if it was a very precious treasure.

data.text:
E-even though my debut is late…… even though 
I don't have anything I can call results, and 
I haven't gotten the attention of anyone……
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
󠁿E-even though my debut is late…… even though 
󠁿I don't have anything I can call results, and 
󠁿I haven't gotten the attention of anyone……

data.text: ……Even then, I want to cling to the word, Hero.
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy

choices.text: It's a good dream
It's a good dream

data.processed: 󠁿……Even then, I want to cling to the word, Hero.

data.text: Eh……?
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy

data.text:
The reason she started this 『Hero Search』, why she skipped 
training, and even the reason she ran all the way here―
data.processed:
󠁿The reason she started this 『Hero Search』, why she skipped 
󠁿training, and even the reason she ran all the way here―

data.text:
All of that was because Zenno Rob Roy hadn't given up on the 
dream, 『I will become a Hero』.
data.processed:
󠁿All of that was because Zenno Rob Roy hadn't given up on the 
󠁿dream, 『I will become a Hero』.

data.text: ……that's not true. It's a shameless and cruel dream.
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: 󠁿……that's not true. It's a shameless and cruel dream.

data.text:
Among my senpai, classmates, and kouhai, there are lots of 
girls who are amazing, strong, and stand out like Heroes.
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
󠁿Among my senpai, classmates, and kouhai, there are lots of 
󠁿girls who are amazing, strong, and stand out like Heroes.

data.text:
They all have such wonderful dreams…… the kind that a story can 
be based on. Like wanting to protect the honor of their family, 
or wanting to make the people watching happy!
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
󠁿They all have such wonderful dreams…… the kind that a story can 
󠁿be based on. Like wanting to protect the honor of their family, 
󠁿or wanting to make the people watching happy!

data.text:
I don't have something like that, I just want to stand out, 
I just want people to look at me……!
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
󠁿I don't have something like that, I just want to stand out, 
󠁿I just want people to look at me……!

data.text:
I don't have a story! 
That's why I've always been in the background……!
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy

choices.text: ……but you still want to be a Hero?

data.processed:
󠁿I don't have a story! 
󠁿That's why I've always been in the background……!

choices.text: Lend me your notebook
Lend me your notebook

data.text: O-okay……?
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: 󠁿O-okay……?

data.text:
I take out a permanent marker. 
I don't open the notebook, I only need the cover.
data.processed:
󠁿I take out a permanent marker. 
󠁿I don't open the notebook, I only need the cover.

data.text: Eh, w-what are you doing? Um……?
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: 󠁿Eh, w-what are you doing? Um……?

data.text:
Now, it's no longer just a 『Notebook』, 
and I hand it back to Zenno Rob Roy.
data.processed:
󠁿Now, it's no longer just a 『Notebook』, 
󠁿and I hand it back to Zenno Rob Roy.

data.text: 『The Heroic Tale of Zenno Rob Roy』……?
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy

choices.text: I want to read this!
I want to read this!

data.processed: 󠁿『The Heroic Tale of Zenno Rob Roy』……?

data.text: Eh――Eeeeh!?
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: 󠁿Eh――Eeeeh!?

data.text:
A dream that can't be given up, that's how strong her wish is. If 
she keeps striving for it, someday―― No, I want it to be granted.

choices.text: Let me help with your training
Let me help with your training

data.processed:
󠁿A dream that can't be given up, that's how strong her wish is. If 
󠁿she keeps striving for it, someday―― No, I want it to be granted.

data.text:
I'm weak and don't stand out…… you might even 
get fed up with me……? Is that really okay……?
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
󠁿I'm weak and don't stand out…… you might even 
󠁿get fed up with me……? Is that really okay……?

data.text:
I nod emphatically. For now, the 『Hero Search』 is on hold. 
――Now, I want to see this story.
data.processed:
󠁿I nod emphatically. For now, the 『Hero Search』 is on hold. 
󠁿――Now, I want to see this story.
